name: Voice of the Wild
enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:inspire_heroics#bard AND !@modifies:ability:countersong#bard AND !@modifies:ability:bardic_knowledge#bard AND !@modifies:ability:versatile_performance#bard AND !@modifies:ability:jack_of_all_trades#bard AND !@modifies:ability:dirge_of_doom#bard AND !@modifies:ability:inspire_competence#bard

description.text: Most bards are inspired by the art of civilization, yet the voice of the wild's muse is the grandeur and beauty of nature. The voice of the wild has discovered some of nature's magical secrets, and can use his performance to bring out the bestial side in his allies.
